name: NE-0: An Enlightening Adventure
description:
A shadowy creature has attacked the power plant, and the neon-drenched city of Neokio has been drenched in darkness. Help NE-0 the robot navigate the perilous power plant and turn on the main generator.

Arrow Keys - Move/Navigate Menu

Z - Interact/Menu Select

A/X - Turn On Lights

R - Restart Level

Alt+Enter - Go/Leave Fullscreen

S - Play/Stop Audio

The game incorporates the theme "Neon" not only in visuals but also in gameplay.  As the player, you must help NE-0 navigate the dark, abandoned power plant and restart the main generator. You can do this by solving puzzles using the dim neon lights available throughout the power plant or by using NE-0's built-in lights.
